consent.confirm: <0>Are you sure?</0><1>By selecting 'No', you won't be able to find out if this campaign is successful, or if there's more action we need to take together to win it. If you select 'Yes' we'll keep you updated about this and our other urgent campaigns.</1><2>You can unsubscribe at any time.</2>
consent.intro: Find out more about our campaigns, actions and {{campaign}} progress
consent.opt-in: Yes, I want {{partner}} to keep me informed via email
consent.opt-in-both: Yes, I want {{partner}} and {{lead}} to keep me informed via email
consent.opt-out: No, don't send me emails or keep me updated in future
